article.headline: Texas Southern 62, Alabama State 59
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Sean Walker hit a shot with six seconds left as Texas Southern beat Alabama State 62-59 Saturday night. Lionel Willis led Texas Southern (13-12, 9-6 Southwestern Athletic) with 18 points and 11 rebounds, and Walker had 12 points. Jermaine Smith had 21 points and Ralfeal Golden added 11 points for Alabama State (10-14,8-7). Texas Southern led 33-28 at halftime.
